name: Antidemic
description:
Can you thrive in the middle of a pandemic threat? do you have the guts to lead humanity and empower science and cultural changes? then step ahead and fight against pandemic in ANTIDEMIC. 

In Antidemic you are in charge of a small city, your mission is to manage it to the point to erase the pandemic from every block of it, but beware, the pandemic spreads from block to block and there is no stop to it till you research the max upgrade or delete if from existence. 

You have several resources;

citizens: The people of your city, must survive

Moral: The moral of your city determines your quarantine actions, don't reach 0 or you'll be gone from the city.

research points: each point is given to improve the fight against the pandemic.

Good look president, god bless your city and we believe you will OVERCOME this Threat.

------------------------------------------------------------------------
Credits:
